dt: {bc}of, relating to, or typical of a Japanese cultural period from about the fifth or fourth millennium {sc}b.c.{/sc} to about 200 {sc}b.c.{/sc} and characterized by elaborately ornamented hand-formed unglazed pottery

et: Japanese {it}jōmon{/it}, literally, straw rope pattern; from the decoration on the pottery
shortdef: of, relating to, or typical of a Japanese cultural period from about the fifth or fourth millennium b.c. to about 200 b.c. and characterized by elaborately ornamented hand-formed unglazed pottery
